base_description: Compact, rectangular, black and gray printer.
part_description: Includes a paper tray, control panel with buttons, scanner lid, and output slot; all arranged on a rectangular body.
internal_interaction_description: The control panel allows users to select functions, sending commands to internal components. The scanner lid lifts to reveal a scanning surface. Paper feeds from the tray through internal rollers to the output slot, where printed documents emerge.
external_interaction_description: Connects to computers or networks for printing documents. Users interact with the control panel for operation. Paper and ink must be supplied externally. Outputs printed documents for user retrieval.
